articles.title: Treat Williams remembered by locals in Manchester, Vermont - The Boston Globe
articles.description: Over the course of his long career, Williams was a widely respected actor known for his roles in the film “Hair” and TV show “Everwood.” But in Manchester, he lived a quiet life and was known as a generous and jocular member of the community.
